description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 07 May at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Camp Support Services (WS4483701069)
#### Solicitation Number
WS4483701069

#### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for the provision of Camp Support Services (CSS) in support of Operation (OP) LENTUS. The successful supplier will provide goods and services, including catering, accommodation support, and maintenance, to enable the operation of remote base camps in British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba.

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Status:** This tender is now closed.
* **Tender Closing Date:** 7 May 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 1 June 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 March 2025
* **Extension Provision:** The contract may be extended for up to three (3) periods of one (1) year each.

#### Preferred Approach
The successful supplier will be selected based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Location of Delivery
The successful supplier will be required to deliver goods and services in the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba.

#### Point of Contact
For more information or to receive the tender package, please contact:
Diane Warnell (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Notice
A tender notice has been published on the Ariba platform. Please follow this link to access the notice:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19388893?extsite=MTkzODg4OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA
